thread.title: Kremlin: We're open to working with Britain over incident involving ex-agent

title: Kremlin: We're open to working with Britain over incident involving ex-agent
text:
Kremlin: We're open to working with Britain over incident involving ex-agent 11:56am GMT - 00:45 
A Kremlin spokesman said Moscow is ''always open for cooperation'' when asked about an incident involving a former Russian double agent who is critically ill after being exposed to an unkown substance. Rough cut (no reporter narration)   
A Kremlin spokesman said Moscow is "always open for cooperation" when asked about an incident involving a former Russian double agent who is critically ill after being exposed to an unkown substance. Rough cut (no reporter narration)  //reut.rs/2oTyuqu
